New Records: Ross Adair became the third Irish men's player to hit a T20I century
Ross Adair and Paul Stirling set Ireland's second-biggest T20I partnership of 137 runs for the first wicket
Ireland's highest T20I score against South Africa is 195-6
Key Match Events: Mark Adair's 4-31 with the ball claimed a 10-run win for Ireland
Graham Hume removed Ryan Rickelton for 36 and took 3-25
Matthew Breetzke passed 50 but was dismissed by Mark Adair
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two-match T20I series was drawn
Ireland will now turn their attentions to the three-match ODI series
The two sides will play at the Zayed Cricket Stadium on Wednesday
Others: The Adair brothers, Ross and Mark, played key roles in Ireland's victory
